subject: Order #SSN3772
description_text: Hi, I have just taken delivery of my order but there are no haptic reactors. And as per order no. Order #SSN3772 It does include the haptic reactors for the 3 pedal's I Have also attached a screenshot of my order. I look forward to hearing from you, Kindest Regards, Nick.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nick_reid,     This is another logistics tracking link for you. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047079991106
Thank you for your prompt reply That's fantastic Kindest Regards Nick
Hi, My delivery hasn't been delivered for the past 3 days now status still saying "out for delivery" could you please chase this up as I don't know who the courier is. Thank you, Nick
Hi ignore previous email the wife was hiding them Kindest Regards Nick
Hi Nick_reid,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Thank you for the good news. Enjoy!
